Apos.​Input.​Trigger
public
Apos.​Input.​Trigger

Used to abstract bool functions away.  This makes it possible to combine bool functions and trigger when any of them return true.

Constructors
Trigger
public Trigger(
params Func<bool>[] triggers
)

Trigger with initial values or empty.

Parameter
triggers
params Func<bool>[]

An array of bool functions.

Public Functions
IsTriggered
public bool IsTriggered()
Returns

Returns true when at least one function is true.

List of conditions.
